title: Muzz
description:
Muslims don’t date - they marry.
Muzz is where Muslims meet. We are the world's biggest Muslim dating app, boasting over 8 million members and over 400,000 successes, Muzz is making a real difference in the huge yet untapped global Muslim demographic.

Backed with a total of $9M investment (Seed and Series A) from a range of Silicon Valley and global investors, headquartered in Aldgate, London, and boasting a fast growing 65+ strong global team, Muzz is transforming how Muslims meet and marry.
